peril.helpers

Class DirectoryHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.helpers.DirectoryHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Directory

    public final class DirectoryHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Directory
    Provides the file paths to all the game assets. Realises Directory.
    Since:
    2018-02-18
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Directory
